description: Students not only investigate the theory of modern analytical chemistry, but also examine the statistical treatment of errors, equilibrium, activities, acid/base chemistry, spectroscopy, electrochemistry and separations. The accompanying lab course, Chemistry 256, illustrates the topics discussed in Chemistry 255. Students taking this course use computers for solving problems. Prerequisite: Chemistry 126. Concurrent registration in Chemistry 256 is required. Offered both semesters.
name: Analytical Chem
notes: Students in Chem 255 must also register for lab Chem 255 L.
prerequisites: Chemistry 126. Concurrent registration in Chemistry 256 is required. Offered both semesters.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Chemistry 126. Concurrent registration in Chemistry 256 is required. Offered both semesters.

title: Analytical Chemistry
